androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Constra.app:visibility: @{isTreadmill ? (WorkoutData.selProgram != programsEnum.MANUAL ? View.VISIBLE : View.GONE) : (WorkoutData.selProgram == programsEnum.HIIT ? View.VISIBLE : View.GONE) }

androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Group.app:visibility: @{isUs ? View.GONE : isTreadmill ? View.GONE : (WorkoutData.disabledLevelUpdate || WorkoutData.selProgram == programsEnum.HEART_RATE || WorkoutData.selProgram == programsEnum.FITNESS_TEST ? View.INVISIBLE : View.VISIBLE)}
@{isUs ? View.GONE : isTreadmill ? View.GONE : (WorkoutData.disabledLevelUpdate || WorkoutData.selProgram == programsEnum.FITNESS_TEST ? View.INVISIBLE : View.VISIBLE)}
